projects.title: PASSWORD GENERATOR
projects.description: A web application that generates secure and customizable passwords based on user-selected criteria like length, inclusion of symbols, numbers, and uppercase/lowercase letters. Built for enhancing online security.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: A Netflix-inspired web app showcasing a sleek user interface to browse and stream dummy movie trailers and shows. Built with React and integrated with TMDB API for dynamic content rendering.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: A personal portfolio website highlighting my projects, skills, and professional journey. Designed to be visually appealing and responsive, showcasing my web development expertise.

projects.title: Typing Test
projects.description: A real-time typing test application where users can measure typing speed and accuracy. Designed to help users improve their typing efficiency, featuring a clean and interactive UI.

projects.title: AbhiChat-AI
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot that uses natural language processing (NLP) to assist users with tasks, provide conversational support, and demonstrate AI-based interactions. Built with React and integrated AI libraries.

projects.title: Commercial Properties
projects.description: A comprehensive property listing platform for commercial real estate. Developed using the MERN stack, it enables users to browse, filter, and upload property listings with ease.

projects.title: recipe
projects.description: A comprehensive property listing platform for commercial real estate. Developed using the MERN stack, it enables users to browse, filter, and upload property listings with ease.
